00013 #include <QVBoxLayout>
00014 #include <QStringList>

00016 
00017 HierarchyRefWidget::HierarchyRefWidget(View* view, 
00018                                                                            QSharedPointer<Component> component,
00019                                                                                 LibraryInterface* libHandler,
00020                                                                            QWidget *parent): 
00021 QWidget(parent),
00022 view_(view),
00023 component_(component),
00024 hierarchyRef_(VLNV::DESIGNCONFIGURATION, libHandler, this, this),
00025 topLevelRef_(this) {
00026 
00027         hierarchyRef_.setTitle(tr("Hierarchy reference"));
00028         hierarchyRef_.setSizePolicy(QSizePolicy::Expanding, QSizePolicy::Minimum);
00029 
00030         QFormLayout* extensionLayout = new QFormLayout();
00031         extensionLayout->addRow(tr("VendorExtension: Reference to a top-level "
00032                 "implementation view"), &topLevelRef_);
00033 
00034         QVBoxLayout* layout = new QVBoxLayout(this);
00035         layout->addWidget(&hierarchyRef_);
00036         layout->addLayout(extensionLayout);
00037         layout->addStretch();
00038 
00039         connect(&hierarchyRef_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00040                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00041         connect(&topLevelRef_, SIGNAL(currentIndexChanged(int)),
00042                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00043 }
00044 
00045 HierarchyRefWidget::~HierarchyRefWidget() {
00046 }
00047 
00048 bool HierarchyRefWidget::isValid() const {
00049         return hierarchyRef_.isValid();
00050 }
00051 
00052 void HierarchyRefWidget::restoreChanges() {
00053         refresh();
00054 
00055         // ask the vlnv from the model
00056         hierarchyRef_.setVLNV(view_->getHierarchyRef());
00057 
00058         // find the text in the combo box and select it
00059         QString topRef = view_->getTopLevelView();
00060         int index = topLevelRef_.findText(topRef);
00061         topLevelRef_.setCurrentIndex(index);
00062 }
00063 
00064 void HierarchyRefWidget::applyChanges() {
00065 
00066         view_->setHierarchyRef(hierarchyRef_.getVLNV());
00067         view_->setTopLevelView(topLevelRef_.currentText());
00068 }
00069 
00070 void HierarchyRefWidget::refresh() {
00071         
00072         // ask the available views from the component
00073         QStringList list = component_->getViewNames();
00074         
00075         // if user does not want to reference any view
00076         list.append(QString(""));
00077         topLevelRef_.addItems(list);
00078 }
